page.title: 15ANOTHER FAMILY WEEKEND 2
page.content: This is Caroline Mills continuing an account of a family weekend.On Sundays we usually go to Cockfield Church because I am in the choir.My mum and older brother,Anthony,read the lessons. When we get home from church about 11 o'clock,the cleaning lady,mum and I have some coffee.Nick has orange squash.Then I phone up my friend or play with my brother.I normally phone my best friend Katherine.Sometimes we play with my rabbit Crystal or we play with Nick.At one o'clock we have lunch. On Sundays people have a roast lunch. After lunch mum takes Katherine and me swimming to the Bury Sports Centre Swimming Pool.On the way home, we drop Katherine off and then go home for tea. After tea I dry my hair.Then I go to bed.If I am lazy and don't get out of bed early enough,I miss my breakfast.
